title: Ten Hag Explains Ronaldo Decision
description:
The FC crew react to Erik ten Hag explaining his decision to remove Cristiano Ronaldo from the matchday squad this weekend after he left Man United's victory over Tottenham early and refused to be subbed on. Plus, Frank Leboeuf joins the show to break down Mbappe and Messi's performance against Ajaccio.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Erik Ten Hag explains Ronaldo decision; Chelsea v Man United preview; Messi and Mbappe combine for decisive win
